about_the_game:
Unlock the Three: A Horror Escape Game

This game can be played in single-player mode or with 2 to 5 players online.

Story:

Unlock the Three tells the story of four characters trapped in a hospital overrun by a mysterious monster. These characters are:

The Police Officer: Strong and brave, they can lead the way in difficult situations.
The Medic: With medical knowledge and skills, she can treat the wounded.
The Security Guard: He knows the hospital's passages and security systems.
The Father: A devout man of faith, he can use his faith to protect the others and ward off the monster.

Gameplay:

The game is played with a team of four players, each controlling one character. One additional player takes control of the monster.

Monster: The monster must use its cunning to hunt its prey and hinder the survivors.

Survivors: The survivors must progress through the hospital by finding keys and escaping the monster. Each character has their own unique set of skills that they must use together to survive.

Character Abilities:

The Police: They can use their pistol flashlight to see around and protect themselves and others from monsters.
The Medic: She can heal the wounded and revive the fallen.
The Priest: He can use his faith to protect the other survivors from the monster. He can hold up a cross to repel the monster and give the others a chance to escape. He can also bless the other survivors to clear their minds.
The Security Guard: He can watch the building from cameras and guide the others.

Features:

A tense and atmospheric experience
Five unique playable characters (including the Monster)
Team-based gameplay
Unlock the Three is an exciting game that combines horror, mystery, and teamwork. Can you work together with your friends to escape the monster and survive the hospital?

About the Developer:

Unlock the Three is created by a solo indie developer, dedicated to crafting unique and immersive gaming experiences.
As a solo developer, I have put a lot of effort into this game, but there might be some issues or bugs. I apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your understanding and support.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for mature audiences and may not be suitable for all players. It contains the following mature content:

Intense Horror: The game features a dark and terrifying atmosphere, with themes of violence and danger. Players may encounter disturbing imagery and unsettling situations.

Moderate Violence: Characters engage in combat with a monstrous entity, and the game depicts physical violence.

Possible Blood: Blood is present in this game.

name: Unlock the Three

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 470, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080Ti , AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Unlock the Three is about a Police,Medic,Security Worker and a Father trying to escape from a Monster in locked hospital. Each survivor has its own unique skills to perform and survivors must be collaborate with each other to be able to escape.
